title: Shades of Loss: A Jude Magdalyn Novella
description: We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against betrayal. Tennessee WilliamsFact--Hart is back from the not-quite-dead.Fact--His ultimate goal is my death.Fact--He'll use anything--and anyone--to help him reach that goal.The only way to save myself--my family--the entire Covenant--is to find the answer to one simple question.Who is the traitor?
author: L.M. Pruitt
